directions: Stir the stock, soup, thyme, veal, mushrooms and green onions in a 3 1/2-quart slow cooker. Cover and cook on LOW for 7 to 8 hours or until the veal is fork-tender.

Stir the flour and water in a small bowl until the mixture is smooth. Stir the flour mixture in the cooker. Turn the heat to HIGH. Cover and cook for 5 minutes or until the mixture boils and thickens.
Stir in the cheese. Serve over the noodles. Season with the black pepper.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Potato Soup
title: Swiss-Style Veal and Mushrooms
